snippet: Ireland beat France, 22-20, in the final match of the Six Nations Championship to edge England, which had beat Italy, 52-11, for the trophy on point differential.
abstract: Ireland's rugby team beats France, 22-20, in the final match of the Six Nations Championship to edge England out of trophy on point differential; other rugby news noted.
lead_paragraph: Ireland beat France, 22-20, in the final match of the Six Nations Championship to edge England, which had beat Italy, 52-11, for the trophy on point differential.
